alert.note: Alert for Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL WARD COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Des Lacs, or 11 miles west of Minot, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burlington, Berthold, Des Lacs, and Foxholm. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
